original_text:
He has shown strength with his arm;
    he has scattered the proud in the thoughts of their hearts;
korean_text: 그의 팔로 힘을 보이사 마음의 생각이 교만한 자들을 흩으셨고

sentences.original_text: He has shown strength with his arm
he has scattered the proud in the thoughts of their hearts
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그 마음의 생각 속에서 교만한 자들을 흩으셨습니다
